General.Name: Ubon Bio Ethanol PCL
General.Description: Ubon Bio Ethanol Public Company Limited produces and distributes processed cassava products in Thailand. It primarily produces ethanol from cassava, as well as distributes electricity. The company also provides industrial-grade ethanol for hand sanitizer spray under the UBON BIO and KLAR brands; and cassava flour and starch products. It is also involved in the farming of coffee and rice. Bio Ethanol Public Company Limited was founded in 2006 and is based in Ubon Ratchathani, Thailand.
